mapper.select: SELECT p.postNo, p.postType, u.userNo, p.fileNo, p.courseNo, TO_CHAR(p.regDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as regDate, p.communityNo, p.scheduleNo, p.postTitle, p.postContent, p.hit FROM post p, users u where p.userNo = u.userNo order by userNo desc
select postNo, postTitle, postContent, hit, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as regDate, userNo from post where postNo = #{postNo}
